Make the most of the good air quality, consider opening windows and getting some outdoor exercise in.
Think about exercising outside or inside - although the air quality isn\'t great, it\'s often this bad in Hanoi.
Try not to do too much outdoors and keep windows closed. Consider wearing a mask.
Avoid outdoor activity unless wearing a suitable mask. Keep doors and windows closed, and consider avoiding indoor exercise too.
